    • Method Detail

      • getRandom

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> T getRandom(java.lang.Class<? extends T> enm,
                                                                      T... exclude)
        Get a random element in the given enum, excluding any elements that a given 'exclude' includes (confusing!) Typically used for ChatColor
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Enum
        Parameters:
        enm - The Enum
        exclude - Any elements from this array will never be selected.
        Returns:
        A random Element from the enum that will never be anything in exclude unless include contains all of the Enum constants, in which case null will be returned

      • getRandom

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> T getRandom(java.lang.Class<? extends T> enm,
                                                                      java.util.function.Supplier<T> ifFull,
                                                                      T... exclude)
        Get a random element in the given enum, excluding any elements that a given 'exclude' includes (confusing!) Typically used for ChatColor
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Enum
        Parameters:
        enm - The Enum
        exclude - Any elements from this array will never be selected.
        ifFull - A Supplier that will be called if there are no enum entries that aren't excluded
        Returns:
        A random Element from the enum that will never be anything in exclude unless include contains all of the Enum constants, in which case the returned value from the Supplier will be returned

      • getRandom

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> java.util.Collection<T> getRandom(java.lang.Class<? extends T> enm,
                                                                                            int amount,
                                                                                            T... exclude)
        Get multiple random elements from the given enum, excluding any elements that exclude includes
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Enum
        Parameters:
        enm - The Enum
        exclude - Any elements from this array will never be selected
        amount - How many elements to get. Will be shortened if not enough exist
        Returns:
        An array containing the given amount (may be less if not enough exist) of randomly picked elements from the enum

      • getRandomFormatted

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> java.lang.String getRandomFormatted(java.lang.Class<? extends T> enm,
                                                                                              int amount,
                                                                                              T... exclude)
        Get all random elements, etc, but add them all together in a StringBuilder and convert them to a String Literally only used for random Chat Colors
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of Enum
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of random elements to generate
        enm - The enum
        exclude - Any elements from this array will never be selected
        Returns:
        A String contain all of the random elements appended to each other
